attributes.action: Open up more canal routes and salvage old ones!
attributes.additional_details: Improve the public pathways surrounding the canals and rivers i.e cycle paths and footpaths!
attributes.background:
our country is a beautiful place and we have a responsibility to preserve and maintain our green and pleasant land.

If we were to Scrape the rivers and canals out and make the river beds deeper you will find that we wouldn’t need to spend so much on river defences?!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about restoring canals are a matter for the Canals and Rivers Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could raise this case with your local MP. You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
